text:
I know its been half a year. But I have a "packaged" version of the v2 I was working on. Works on Chrome and Firefox

There is a v2 branch on the Github repo, there are instruction in the readme to install it.
<https://github.com/GonzaloTorreras/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/tree/v2>

It basically re built from scratch, and I've strip the design for now

There is a few new features

*Option Menu*
This is how you turn stuff on and you can now add/edit the dev menu

*Edit Module in Design Manager*
While on a HS page and the Sprocket Menu is present, click it and then click on a module. It'll open in the DM (kinda like developer mode in the page editor)

*HubSpot Panel in the console*
Just shows the developer info


This is still very much a beta, only I have tested/used it, so there is probably issues :slightly_smiling_face:
Also just updated it to work with the new menu
